home.conference_info_1: PragVue is back for its second edition, celebrating the power and potential of Vue.js in the heart of Europe. We‚Äôre bringing famous names from the Vue.js community to the City of a Hundred Spires for an event packed with inspiring talks. It‚Äôs the perfect opportunity to grow your skills, network with like-minded professionals, and stay ahead in the rapidly evolving world of Vue.js.
home.conference_info_2: Vue.js is easy to learn, scalable, highly performant thanks to its coherent reactivity system, and has a rich ecosystem of surrounding libraries. Despite its greatness, Vue.js remains undiscovered by many. That's precisely why we're hosting this conference - to delve deeper into its potential and shed light on its remarkable capabilities.
home.early_bird_tickets_info: Early bird ticket price is only available until the end of June
home.speakers_info: Get ready to be inspired by an outstanding lineup of Vue.js community members who will share their knowledge, hands-on experience, and fresh perspectives. Expect everything from a closer look at ecosystem tools to big-picture views on modern web practices. Whether you‚Äôre a long-time Vue enthusiast or just starting out, you‚Äôll find plenty to spark new ideas. Don‚Äôt miss the opportunity to learn from and connect with skilled professionals.
home.speakers_you_info: We are still looking for a few more speakers! Whether you're an experienced conference patron or seeking your first opportunity to shine, now's your chance. If you have something to share about Vue, contact us via the button below to discuss the details.
home.look_back_on_2024: PragVue 2024 was a blast! Last year, we hosted the first Czech Vue.js conference. Thank you to all the attendees and all the speakers. We‚Äôre hoping to make the next one even better!
home.link_2024: Speakers from the 2024 conference - click to check details
home.venue_info: PragVue will take place at {hotel} conveniently located in the center of Prague, just one block away from Wenceslas Square and within walking distance from all 3 metro lines as well as the main railway station. This makes it a perfect place to host a decent international event. It offers modern conference rooms and equipment as well as first class catering that will be ready to serve on 23 September 2025.
home.venue_offer: The 5-star {hotel} also offers comfortable overnight accommodation without having to worry about navigating around the city. We‚Äôve arranged a special partnership offer for {offer} for all PragVue guests! Contact us after completing your ticket purchase to receive this benefit.
home.prague_info: It is just about frontend development. PragVue also gives you chance to explore Prague's stunning Gothic and Baroque architecture, vibrant history, and modern culture. Discover the world's largest ancient castle at Prague Castle, walk the famous Charles Bridge over the Vltava River, and observe the marvelous Astronomical Clock in the historic Old Town Square. And there is much more to do, both during the day and in the night alike. Prague offers a perfect mix of history, culture, nature, and tech, ensuring a fulfilling visit alongside your professional engagements.
home.sponsors_info: Gain valuable exposure, connect with a passionate audience of developers, and help us shape the future of Vue.js by sponsoring PragVue. {br}{br} Seize this chance to connect with talented developers, share your vision, and shine a spotlight on your brand.

2024.title: PragVue 2024
2024.about: The first PragVue was held on 17 September 2024. It was a rather small meetup, but we saw eight Vue/Nuxt developers giving their interesting talks, and new friendships were formed.
